lines.text: I know what's going on in here, with all of you men going "Hee hee hee, boo boo boo, hah hah hah.
Screw you, honey. Boy, if there's one thing I can't stand it's a queen without a sense of humor. You can die with your secret... miserable piss-elegant fairy.
A person can catch Athlete's Foot in a place like this!
You're lucky if that's all you catch.
You're a good man, Abe. I'm gonna have a novena said for you when I get back to Cleveland. What's your last name? Abe what?
Lefkowitz.
I'll still have a novena said for you when I get back.
[Gaetano leaves]
You know, I had a novena said for me once. I asked to wake up gorgeous.
So, what happened?
Well look at me!
Listen, there's something I have to tell you...
You're not gay?

[relieved]
No!
What, are you a social worker or something?
No, but I didn't know that everyone in here was...
GAY! See? It's not a bad word. You might try using it sometime.
You mean to tell me that everyone in here is gay?
God, I hope so. Otherwise I just paid ten dollars to walk around in a towel in front of a bunch of Shriners.
What's the matter with you? I thought all dicks could whistle.
Only "Stormy Weather."
Margaret Dumont! I thought you were dead!
There's a reason people like me don't ride the subway. I'm looking right at him.
Is that supposed to mean me? Screw you, honey. You can die with your secret, piss-elegant fairy! If there's anything I can't stand, it's a queen without a sense of humor.
Ya really know how to mess up an act, you know that mister?
You know what they call people like you?
Fashionable.
We used to have a guy like that back in the army. We called him "Get away from me Claude".

[singing in a thick accent]
"Ebey'tings comin' up rho-ziz, por me and por chu."

[In a thick accent]
One of dees days ju is going to see de name of Googie Gomez up in lights and you gonna ask to juself,
[gasps]
'Gwas dat her?' An den ju gonna answer to juself,
[gasps]
I gwas ALWAYS her, jus dat nobody knows it!"

[to Carmine]
Dumb and dizzy, that's me, Darling.
There will be an orgy beginning in room 340 in exactly minutes! Orgy in 340! Four minutes!
See something you like, Buddy?

[to Brick]
Hey! What do you need, a brick wall to fall on your head? Resting! It's a euphemism for not interested... Skinny!

[announcing Chris's arrival]
340 coming up. That is three-four-oh. She's here, boys!
My, what unusual pants. They look like cowboy chaps.

[fixing Gaetano with an intense stare and spoken in a rich, deep voice]
They are cowboy chaps.

[nervously]
That's what I was thinking. They look like cowboy chaps.

[to Carmine]
You know Mister, you really know how to break up an act.
I need some kind of code name.

[excitedly]
Evelyn!
No. I don't like Evelyn. It sounds too effiminate.

[in a deep voice]
How about Bunny?
I like it.
Crisco.
What?
Crisco Oil Party. Room 419. Pass it on.
Pass what on?
Bring Joey.
Who's Joey?
You know Joey. Don't bring Chuck. You've got that?
Crisco Oil Party. Room 419. I can bring Joey but not Chuck.
Check.
What's the matter with Chuck?
[answer is whispered in his ear]

[absolutely horrified]
Chuck is definitely out!

[walking away]
Hey, you won't be disappointed.
People like you think the whole world is queer.
Well, it's lucky for people like you it is.
I thought you'd sworn off this place.
I thought I had, too.
You got homesick for us, right?
Well, I didn't have much choice. I've been barred from the Athenium.
Come on! No one gets barred from the Athenium.
Well, there was this man there...
A fat man, right?

Fat? He was the Magic Mountain! He threw me into one of my frenzies. I went beserk and kicked his door open, so they threw me out and told me never to come back again. I was willing to pay for it. I just wanted to talk to him. You know how I am.
It's good to be back, Abe! I feel strangely optimistic about this evening.
I'd prefer something on three.

[mumbling]
Yeah, yeah...

[to Gaetano]
Did they ever put you on four? It's Siberia up there.

[disappointed]
You're not Joe Namath!
It's the lighting.

[trying to seduce Gaetano]
You'll never guess what I had for dinner tonight, so I'm just going to tell you.
I beg your pardon?
A nice ground-pork meatloaf with mozzarella, mashed potatoes covered with gobs of gravy, carrots floating in butter and chunks of avocado with roquefort dressing. Couldn't you just die?

[confused]
I don't know what I could just.
And then for dessert German choclate cake with two scoops of mocha walnut ice cream.

[frequent refrain]
Jelly Roll, baby! You're my Jelly Roll man!
Think of a tropical night. Think of a beetch.
What bitch?

[his dying words]
Get Proclo!
We got nightclub, movies, swimming pool, steam room, massage table, discothèque, bridge, amateur night... and free blood tests every Wednesday.
As strange as it may seem, no one is going to attack you.
Someone already has!
Eh, beginner's luck.
I don't know what I'm doing!
Join the club! It's like some strange heterosexual Gypsy curse was put on this place.
I was born with this voice.
So was Yma Sumac!
We OWN this place?
Papa did a lot of expanding while you were in Cleveland.
Into the steamroom, girls.
